entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow. Periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
